languages.text: "Сотрудничество повысит твои шансы на выживание. Пока ты приносишь пользу, я буду поддерживать твою органику в работоспособном состоянии и, может быть, дам поиграть с наименее значимыми из моих объектов".
"Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."
languages.original_text: "Сотрудничество повысит твои шансы на выживание. Пока ты приносишь пользу, я буду поддерживать твою органику в работоспособном состоянии и, может быть, дам поиграть с наименее значимыми из моих объектов".

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. You will have access to the least important of my resources: equipment, surgical intervention, bodyguards. But if you require a negative incentive, know that I am considering more than four dozen ways to use you as material for my inventions. Each one involves endless agony. You will not be allowed to choose your fate."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Une coopération augmentera vos chances de survie. Tant que vous continuerez à vous rendre utile, je préserverai les parties organiques de votre corps et je vous laisserai peut-être même jouer avec mes échantillons de moindre importance. »
languages.original_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."

traits.locale_text: « Une coopération augmentera vos chances de survie. Tant que vous continuerez à vous rendre utile, je préserverai les parties organiques de votre corps et je vous laisserai peut-être même jouer avec mes échantillons de moindre importance. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “只要合作，你就更有机会存活下来。只要你继续当个有用的实验样本，我就愿意维护你的有机部分，甚至可能会允许你玩弄一部分不太重要的实验样本。”
languages.original_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."

traits.locale_text: “与我合作会提高你的存活几率。我可以为你提供我最不需要的资源：装备、外科手术，还有保镖。不过，如果你还需要负面刺激的话，我可以告诉你，我此刻脑子里想出了五十几种方法，关于如何把你当成材料，制作我的新作品，而且每种方法都会给你带来无尽的痛苦。在这件事情上，你别无选择。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr kooperiert, erhöht das Eure Überlebenschancen. Solange Ihr mir nützlich seid, werde ich Eure organischen Bestandteile erhalten und Euch vielleicht sogar mit einigen meiner weniger bedeutsamen Proben spielen lassen."
languages.original_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr kooperiert, erhöht das Eure Überlebenschancen. Ihr werdet Zugang zu den unwichtigsten meiner Ressourcen haben: Ausrüstung, chirurgische Intervention, Leibwächter. Wenn Ihr jedoch einen negativen Anreiz braucht, so sei Euch gesagt: Ich erwäge vier Dutzend verschiedene Arten, Euch als Material für meine Erfindungen einzusetzen. Jede davon ist mit endlosen Qualen verbunden. Euch wird nicht gestattet sein, Euer Schicksal zu wählen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Si cooperas, tendrás más posibilidades de sobrevivir. Mientras me seas útil, mantendré en buen estado tus componentes orgánicos e incluso permitiré que juguetees con mis muestras menos esenciales».
languages.original_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."

traits.locale_text: «Si cooperas, tendrás más posibilidades de sobrevivir. Tendrás acceso a mis recursos de menor valor: equipo, intervención quirúrgica o escoltas. Pero si quieres un incentivo negativo, que sepas que ya he pensado en mil maneras de usarte como material para mis inventos. Y todos conllevan un sufrimiento interminable. No podrás escoger tu destino».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「協力すれば、生き残る確率が高くなる。お前が私の役に立っている限り、私はお前の有機的な部位を維持し、私のおそらくはさほど重要ではないいくつかのサンプルで遊ばせてやろう」
languages.original_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."

traits.locale_text: 「協力すれば、生き残る確率が高くなる。お前が私の役に立っている限り、私はお前の有機的な部位を維持し、私のおそらくはさほど重要ではないいくつかのサンプルで遊ばせてやろう」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "İş birliği, hayatta kalma şansını artıracaktır. İşime yaramayı sürdürdüğün sürece organik parçalarına bakım yapabilir, hatta belki daha az önemli numunelerimle oynamana müsaade edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Cooperation will increase your odds of survival. As long as you continue to be of use, I will maintain your organic parts and perhaps even let you play with some of my less significant samples."

traits.locale_text: "İş birliği, hayatta kalma şansını artıracaktır. İşime yaramayı sürdürdüğün sürece organik parçalarına bakım yapabilir, hatta belki daha az önemli numunelerimle oynamana bile izin verebilirim."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
